properties.Name: EventCategory
properties.Description:
A categorization of event types.

Ex:
Individual
Event Type = Birth Of Child
Event Category = Family Event

Event Type = Employment Layoff
Event Category = Employment Event

Legal Entity
Event Type = Incorporation
Event Category = Corporate Administration

Event Type = Annual Reports Filed
Event Category = Corporate Administration

Event Type = Bankruptcy Filing
Event Category = Corporate Administration
